name: Macho Shot
summary: Merge Machos, a fast-paced merging puzzle game, challenges players to grow their Machos by combining like types, while carefully avoiding letting them overflow off the play field. Reach for new high scores as you master the art of Macho merging. Compete against friends in multiplayer modes, with support for up to 4 players using shared Joy-Con controllers. In Score Attack, increase your score and aim for the top of global leaderboards or battle head-to-head, strategically blocking each other out to be the last Macho standing.
